summary: A Vibrant Realistic ENB that focuses on playability and performance and not tons of effects for screenshots. Uses a nice Bloom / Simple DoF / Realistic Lighting With Customization 3.4 Profile / Sharpening / Sun Rays / Dark Nights
descriptionHtml:
[center]
[size=3pt]This is my first ENB, It focuses on playability and [U]not[/U] tons of effects that are pretty to look at and take screenshots with. I made it simple and with good performance, you should notice very low to almost no FPS hit.[/size]

[size=4pt][color=red]This Is A Work In Progress[/color][/size]

[IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/308y55k.jpg[/IMG]
[IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/20gn8.jpg[/IMG]

[size=3pt]
[color=red] --- Features --- [/color]
Bright and Colorful days
Dark Realistic Nights (A torch is very helpful)
Good Lightning and Shadows
Sun Ray Effects
A Simple Depth of Field
Quality Bloom
Warm Interiors
Sharpening
[/size]

[IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/mc6np3.jpg[/IMG]
[IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/2n9wad1.jpg[/IMG]


[size=4pt]
[color=red] --- Installation --- [/color]
1. Extract the contents of \"ENBronz.zip\" to your Skyrim main folder, overwrite if necessary.

2. Download ENBSeries 0.113 \"d3d9.dll\" from http://enbdev.com/mod_tesskyrim_v0113.htm and place it in your Skyrim main folder, overwrite if necessary.

3.I strongly recommend Revamped Exterior Fog http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/9930

3. Enable Realistic Lighting With Customization in Data Files. And Revamped Exterior Fog.
[color=red]I strongly recommend this load order in Data Files;
Realistic Lightning.esp
Realistic Lightning Patcher.esp
Revamped Exterior Fog.esp[/color]

4. Increase/Decrease brightness ingame to 50%, or whatever fits your monitor.
[/size]

[size=3pt]
[color=red] --- Uninstall --- [/color]
1. Remove all files you added from \"ENBronz.zip\" from your main Skyrim folder.
2. Remove Realistic Lightning from Data folder.
3. Adjust brightness ingame.
[/size]

[IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/2j1wgmg.jpg[/IMG]

[size=3pt]
[color=red] --- Recommended Settings --- [/color]
Anti-Aliasing 8x
Anistropic Filtering 16x
FXAA
Textures: High
Radial Blur: Medium
Decals: High
[/size]

[size=3pt]
[color=red] --- Recommended Mods --- [/color]
Pure Waters - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/1111
Enhanced Night Skyrim - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/85
HD Cinematic Fire Effects - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2692
Revamped Exterior Fog - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/9930
Remove Interior Fog - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/9571
Vibrant Auras - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6675
HD Textures
[/size]


[color=red] --- What needs to be done --- [/color]
Interiors might be too dark in some corners where there\'s no light source.
Lens Flare effects might be too powerful.
And possible alot more.

[IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/34ye5qs.jpg[/IMG]

This ENB is somewhat based on Jasmin ENB, credits go to him, altho it\'s heavily modified to suit my likings and i\'ve added a realistic lightning profile.
If there\'s anything just ask and help me get this ENB better :D
/ronzem
[/center]
author: ronzem
